messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Having loved Poole since boyhood, raised my family and built my business here, I know we can do better. It's time for a fresh vision for the 'Beautiful Place'. Let's promote Poole as a world class Sailing and Water Sports Centre to boost tourism and local business.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Affordable housing on big brownfield sites.
Tackle anti-social behaviour, from party house nuisance and Traveller incursions to off-shore wind farms.
Let's quit the EU and trade freely with the whole world.

issues.brexitEurope: Let's quit the EU and trade freely with the whole world.
issues.environment: Tackle anti-social behaviour, from party house nuisance and Traveller incursions to off-shore wind farms.

housing.content: Affordable housing on big brownfield sites.

images.caption: David Young in Poole Standing Up for Real Change
